meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Darren Harris-Fain Martha Holland Phil Arevalo Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7088.

td.p: Darren Harris-Fain, an English professor from Prattville, Alabama
Martha Holland, a school administrator from Newtown, Pennsylvania
Phil Arevalo, a Ph.D. candidate in microbiology originally from Springfield, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $23,600)

tr.td: VIDEO & FILM
KANSAS
WORDS THAT SHOULD RHYME
(Alex: "Silo" and "kilo" is an example.)
TOYS & GAMES
DISCOVERIES
I PLAYED HIM IN THE RECENT MOVIE

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Phil: What is white noise?)

ambient

Phil
Triple Stumper
')

the Panama Canal')

During the 1976 presidential campaign, Ronald Reagan said of this, "We built it, we paid for it, it's ours & we are going to keep it"
Phil
Martha
Darren
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
New champion: $22,000
Phil
Martha
Darren

5 R,
2 W

27 R
(including 2 DDs),
5 W
(including 1 DD)

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
